/usr/bin/c++  -std=c++11 -g   CMakeFiles/test1.dir/button.cpp.o  -o test1 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libwayland-client.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcairo.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libEGL.so /usr/local/lib/libwayland-egl.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpango-1.0.so -lpangocairo-1.0 -lgobject-2.0 -lglib-2.0
